SEARCH
Package core

Class ChildAccount

java.lang.Object
core.Account
core.ChildAccount
public class ChildAccount extends Account
Represents a child's account with specific attributes and methods. This class extends the Account class and includes features such as balance, savings, transaction history, saving goals, and tasks.
Author:
Siyuan Lu

      Parameters:
      accountId - the unique identifier for this child account
      name - the username associated with this child account
      password - the password associated with this child account
